channel.title: PvP drops
channel.description:
[i][b] Hi. I'm trying to make it to where if somebody kills somebody at the PvP area it's PvP drops instead of the Regular drops.Anyone have a(n) idea on how i can do that?
[/b][/i][br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 30, 2009, 09:18:55 am[/size][hr]Bump
